website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic choice for customers seeking the max amount of storage in a dog backpack.
pros: Equipped with 12 carabiner loops and 4 pockets
Available for small, medium, and large dogs
Saddlebag is removable, doubling as a single dog harness
cons: Some complaints that the sizing chart is inaccurate

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and I love it. It's seems durable, fits many items and I love that the saddlebags come off. I took advice from a review and ordered a size smaller because me dog is an "in between size". He's a 43 lb Cattledog measuring 19" high at his shoulder, 27" around his chest and 20" long- shoulder to base of tail. The small is adjusted to almost max length. The leash attachment is on his back but like another reviewer, I'll add a carabiner to the front for more control.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Love this pack
customer_reviews.text: Love this pack. Costs much less than the Ruffwear pack, but design and quality are the same. We've only used it a few times so far, but it is made well.stitching and zippers are super strong. If you like the Ruffwear Palisades pack, but don't want to spend $150, then buy this one. Definitely worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Zggir

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags, they look great, actually hold a lot of stuff, and are relatively water-proof. Unfortunately, my dog has worn them out hiking several times and each time, they gradually slide to one side or the other. I'm not sure if it's because my dog has a short, coarse coat (boxer/mastiff) or because of his gait or what. I wish they didn't slide because I would use them on all of our longer hikes :/
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Shaheen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: For the price you really can not beat this pack. In my opinion they run big so make sure to follow the sizing. I'm coming from a $170 dog pack to this and really have zero "real" complaints. Only thing I would complain about is its somewhat difficult to remove the pack from the harness while it's on the dog, the buckle placement could be much better. Also stealing the strap padding from my other harness to use on this one as they are sub standard in my opinion. If you don't mind a little customizing though this pack is an amazing start
customer_reviews.author: Justin Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack for my service dog
customer_reviews.text: I love how this back pack is set up. I am using it for my service dog. He carries what would be in my purse and my diabetes supplies in the back pack. But when I don't need the supplies with me, like around the house and yard or quick trips around town, he still has the base with that I have sewn diabetic alert and service dog patches. Unlike the previous back pack I had, this is well balanced and has plenty of pockets for both his supplies as well as mine.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, but sizing info is off
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made. Haven't had a chance to give it a rugged test, but quick walks and light hikes it holds up well. If the pack isn't evenly balanced it will immediately start to tip towards the heavier side (duh), but it seems that it doesn't take much offset weight for this to happen. It's 4 star review is because sizing is off. My dog should have fit the Large size based on their listed measurements, but I had to return and get a Medium because even when made as tight as possible, the large just did not fit. If your dog is in between sizes, go for the smaller size
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Won't last
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my German Shepard for a backpacking trip. The straps on the harness are nice and the adjustments are adequate. The saddle bags themselves are durable enough, but the retention strap to compress the saddle bags for smaller loads did not compress enough on the last day of our 4 day hike. The mesh that the saddle bags are affixed to is the weak link. The seams started to separate and give way. It is a high stress point that is not reinforced.
customer_reviews.author: slick boater

customer_reviews.title: Great doggie daypack!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this backpack a few months ago for our dog. She is 60 lbs and the medium fits well. So far this backpack has held up very well and seems to be sturdily made. The packs are large enough to fit water bottles or food and toys, and have multiple zippers and places to clip things on. And I love that the pack is detachable from the harness. The only complaints I have are that it is difficult to get on/off because the three buckles are hidden, and that the pack slips to one side easily and must be readjusted often. But overall I would recommend for hiking or daytrips with your dog!
customer_reviews.author: Tina O.

customer_reviews.title: adjustable, bags are detachable. even worked on Great Dane body - big chest slim waist :)
customer_reviews.text: i'm still working out small details on how to adjust it, but so far she was caring 10lb of raw bones we've got from the butcher and backpack worked fine. i will do longer trips with heavier loads to see how this pack performs. so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Andre R.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and priced.
customer_reviews.text: Made well. Identical to the picture but stiff and not comfortable like I would insist for my service dog. Looks identical to his ruff ware model but has an easy release pack that the othe harness does not come with. My other harness is better, comfortable but much more expensive. This was a lot for the money, must admit.
customer_reviews.author: Janae

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend this Pack!!!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is awesome!!! 2 large pockets with compression straps and 2 small pockets, waterproof, nice waterproof zippers, well sewn, no buckals agaisnt dogs skin, well padded all the way around, sturdy grab handle and lesh hook, great breathablity, great adjustablity, easy on and off, and removalable saddle bags, and a reasonable price! I bought a medium for my boxer and it fits perfect with adjustablity in either direction. Best pack on the market! Thank you👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lamson

customer_reviews.title: Deal you can't pass up
customer_reviews.text: Best harness and dog backpack you can get on the market amazing material very high quality also comes with a super sturdy harness for your pup would recommend this for any dog has all sizes you can pick from red or green I'm sure they're coming out with more colors I posted pictures unboxing very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Straight out the box, without hitting the trail, this seems great quality! I ordered a large for my 120lb Irish Wolfhound/Red Tick Coonhound cross. It is extended quite a bit but there's still about 7". It seems to be comfortable enough. He acted like it wasn't even there.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Becerra

customer_reviews.title: Fits a Great Dane!
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad that the large size fit our Great Dane as well as it does! We haven’t gotten to use it yet, just got it in the mail today. I worry that the chest strap will rub in her armpits but I will update when we get to use it. With her large chest and small waist, I was happy that our first purchase could adjust to fit well in both areas. More to come!
customer_reviews.author: Adam & Lauren Zink

customer_reviews.title: Well made, hard to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, tough. Rear straps hard to fasten, front straps hard to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Chart is vary inaccurate and needs to be updated
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and it's well made, double stitched high quality buckles but the sizing information is off. According to the sizing chart, my dog should be on the large size of the small, but it didn't fit. So I returned it and got the medium size and that still didn't fit. So I returned that and got the large size and it doesn't fit either...so I"m sending it back. I don't see any way to contact the seller, so I'm moving on and buying something from REI. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great pack, definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! My dog gets super excited to put it on. It takes a bit for them to get used to it and, yes, it is a bit of a pain to get the initial adjustments down on the sizing. Once that is done, it looks great and feels very sturdy. Lots of room for my dogs to carry their food, water and first aid supplies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit.
customer_reviews.text: Have really enjoyed this harness and backpack. Note: if you play disc golf your pup can carry 6-8 discs for you :)
customer_reviews.author: Whisper Mare

customer_reviews.title: Great product will be buying another
customer_reviews.text: XL fit our Newfoundland perfect. He carried #17. Ripped a side bag off running through the woods after a bear, pretty rare that’ll happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy an my larger dog doesn’t seem to mind it. Great for hikes.
customer_reviews.author: sibs

customer_reviews.title: Well made. My dog acclimated to it quickly both ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made. My dog acclimated to it quickly both with and without the bags. The only difficulty was that the rearmost strap does not shorten wnough for a snug fit around his middle. Fits well around the neck and chest though.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I love that the packs are removable from the harness, it’s like a 2 for 1. I use this to help tire out my hyper puppy (she can carry her own water) so when we take a break we can all have free time after just a couple of QDs. Seems weatherproof, but winter is coming...
customer_reviews.author: Joy Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: On my first hiking trip in Maine the first day the stitching gave way. I had to try and lace the pack back together using bungee cords as I was on a 3 week trip through the mountains. How do I return this pack. Totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: gayle oneill

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic pack! It wasn’t planned, but I ended up needing to haul/pull my 50 lb husky up and down a vertical drop of over 5 feet. The harness didn’t support all of her weight, and we did take the pack off, but holy heck did did fantastic! Not a single popped stitch !
customer_reviews.author: Denise Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, seems very comfortable for dog
customer_reviews.text: We love this pack. Had to do lots of research to find one that would for our Mastiff puppy. It seems very comfortable and he doesn't mind wearing it at all. He's been on a few walks with it so far and no raw spots or wear that we can see. He's 150lbs in the picture, for size reference.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium. I got a large. Re-ordered and returning the incorrect size.
customer_reviews.author: MGC

customer_reviews.title: No shifting of saddle bags.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pack. The weight doesn’t shift and it is breathable to keep my dog cool. The back strap is to long for her skinny belly so I need to sew it with the parachute thread, in the pic you see it’s shortened with a rubber band.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits very well - many points to adjust for good fit. Sturdy and stable! Will slide a bit to the side if unbalanced, but doesn't impede my dog's gait.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful pack! Fit my great Pyrenees perfectly
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful pack! Fit my great Pyrenees perfectly. Haven't taken on a trip yet. But I expect it to perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Tausha Cushman

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: It is made very well and durable. It is a bit confusing on how to put it on my dog. However, my Golden Retriever did quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: We had to send this back, it was too wide for our Golden. She would knock us over on the trail. It also shifts around a lot.
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly nice quality and easy to adjust and put on. Love the padding to protect the dog too. Very pleased with the saddle bags and the color is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Taylor

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this backpack.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this backpack. I only bought one and now they get jealous of the one that has it on. Guess I'm going to have to buy another one before we go out hiking again. I have two goldens. I got it for going for day hikes. The backpack fits them great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: Buy dog chewed through the strap in less than five min
customer_reviews.author: William Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The bottom ripped out the second time my pup used this pack.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra Davisson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pack, very similar to a particular name brand ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pack, very similar to a particular name brand pack, but without the additional cost... can be a little challenging to get balanced, but that is the same with any pack we have tried for our Beast of a dog...
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: These are so great! Just make sure you get an even weight ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so great! Just make sure you get an even weight distribution or your dog will pull in one direction or the other. hehe
customer_reviews.author: Laura Forster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely sized for my dog to be able to carry some of his own water and snacks
customer_reviews.author: R Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction, used once
customer_reviews.text: Used for One hike. Both saddle bag seams came undone at the bottom. Spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Maile McKain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great dog pack so far. Hasn't started to fall apart yet like other dog packs I've had.
customer_reviews.author: ELIJAH JOEL WRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Better then others
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, I should know, I have tried several, however after our 8th use, I notice the zipper failing and places where the material is coming away from the seam. I do not attach,the leash to the back pack, good thing. Another annoying aspect is that the zippers should have pulls, would make it a neck of a lot easier to open the pockets. But in comparison to my previous backpack purchases I would give it a solid 3.5 if I could.
customer_reviews.author: C. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great bag was originally going to get the palisades pack ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag was originally going to get the palisades pack but this looked similar and almost 1/3 the cost. It is working great right now the only problem is the sizing my dog is 27in and the back strap does not get tight enough so like one of the other reviewers said get the smaller pack if your right inbetween on the sizes. Other then that it is a great pack!
customer_reviews.author: trevor ketcherside

product_meta.title: Pettom Dog Hiking Harness Backpack Pet Adjustable Removable Saddle Bag Waterproof Walking Camping Packs for Medium Large Dogs
feature_bullets: Two Way Used .Ideal for multi-day back-country adventures:The Dog Harness Backpack makes multiple purposes, outdoor adventures possible with features like a load compression system, night reflecting protection
【Cooling Mesh & Reflective】 Waterproof oxford and breathable mesh harness provides airflow and keeps your dog cool. Bright color and reflective piping ensure the safety in dark
【Adjustable Straps & Large Capacity】 Adjustable straps ensure the comfort for dogs walking and running. Two side pockets with huge capacity to carry dog food, first aid kit, dog toys, poop bags, etc
【Assistant Handle & High Quality】 The handle on this backpack helps lift dog up over obstacles when outward hounding or training. It is made of 600D oxford cloth, high-grade,strong and durable.
【Quick Release Buckle & Durable D-ring】 Premium quality D-ring is convenient to connect leash. The plastic buckle design make it convenient to wear the saddle bag

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
